title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Scoring Note: Acceptable labels for the force include: F T MathType@MTEF@5@5@@37F3@ , F MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamOraaaa@36BF@ , F pull MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AEB@ , F Paper MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BAB@ , F hand MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AC9@

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Scoring Note: Full points may be earned for a response that uses energy and kinematics to derive an expression for the acceleration of Roll 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaaGOmaaaa@36B1@ .

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Scoring Note: The two points for part (d) can be earned independently of the rest of the points on the question, as long as the student correctly interprets the consistency between their answers for parts (a) and (c). For example, a student who earns zero points in parts (a) or (c) can still earn full credit in (d) if they reason why their incorrect diagrams are consistent with each other.
